title: Buy Walmart Stock Because the Retailer Is ‘Gaining Traction With Consumers’
text:
Walmart stock rose Monday, helped by a bullish note from Robert W. Baird, which argues that the retail giant is making all the right moves.

The back story. Walmart (ticker: WMT) has been one of the few winners in retail this year. The stock has climbed 26.5% in 2019, ahead of the S&P 500’s 20% climb and well above the SPDR S&P Retail ETF’s (XRT) 2% returns. The company isn’t immune to tariffs, but its scale gives it an edge over other competitors, many analysts believe. Meanwhile earnings have been strong, and plenty...
description: Baird analyst Peter Benedict reiterated an Outperform rating on Walmart and raised his price target by $10 to $130, following his recent meetings with company executives.
